name: Late night shopping (Apmds)
description:
After learning that the elves still haven't made all of the presents for this year, Santa decides to help get the last gifts by buying them at his local shop. But he is lacking time! While the elves rush to make some of the remaining presents, Santa buys all the gifts that he can, so the children of the world can be happy.

Controls:

- Use the mouse to navigate the menus;

- To wrap a present, get all the presents shown in the list and another one will show up and the present will count as wrapped.

Problems:

- No background image for the game.

- Dropping a present too close to the borders of the cart may not register.

- Sound may repeat when playing the html version.
